pkgmetadata.longdescription: RFSI STRK Interpolation for Meteo and Environmental Variables // Random Forest Spatial Interpolation (RFSI, Sekuli et al. (2020) doi:10.3390/rs12101687) and spatio-temporal geostatistical (spatio-temporal regression Kriging (STRK)) interpolation for meteorological (Kilibarda et al. (2014) doi:10.1002/2013JD020803, Sekuli et al. (2020) doi:10.1007/s00704-019-03077-3) and other environmental variables. Contains global spatio-temporal models calculated using publicly available data.
